video.title: Midsomer Murders
video.synopsis: In this detective drama, a police inspector and his sergeant crack hard-to-solve crimes in the fictional English county of Midsomer.

episodes.synopsis: The elderly Miss Bellringer insists that her friend did not die of a heart attack as her doctor claims, but was in fact murdered.
episodes.title: The Killings at Badger's Drift

episodes.synopsis: After a noted author speaks before a group of local Midsomer writers, the naked body of the event's host is found bludgeoned to death in his bedroom.
episodes.title: Written in Blood

episodes.synopsis: Joyce is cast in a revival of "Amadeus," but complications arise when the leading man is murdered onstage.
episodes.title: Death of a Hollow Man

episodes.synopsis: When the residents of Morton Fendle learn that the local mill is to be shut, many also realize that they will lose their investments in the place.
episodes.title: Faithful Unto Death

episodes.synopsis: When the co-founder of a New Age commune is found dead at the bottom of a staircase, the question is whether he fell or was pushed.
episodes.title: Death in Disguise

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and his wife plan to renew their wedding vows for their 25th anniversary, but he is distracted by a brutal murder committed with a sword.
episodes.title: Death's Shadow

episodes.synopsis: The body of a Brazilian woman is found strangled in the woods, which suggests that a serial killer from nine years earlier has begun killing again.
episodes.title: Strangler's Wood

episodes.synopsis: Murder strikes while Midsomer Worthy and new batter Troy are preparing for the annual cricket match against neighboring village Fletcher's Cross.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Eleven

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a village blow-hard, who had few supporters among his neighbours, happens while a gathering of travellers is taking place.
episodes.title: Blood Will Out

episodes.synopsis: Fox hunting, taxidermy and Oscar Wilde are part of the puzzle as Barnaby and Troy investigate the brutal slaying of a tramp in the woods.
episodes.title: Death of a Stranger

episodes.synopsis: A visit to his convalescent aunt prompts Barnaby to investigate a series of suspicious deaths at the nursing home where she is staying.
episodes.title: Blue Herrings

episodes.synopsis: The residents of Midsomer Mallow fear for their chances in the Perfect Village contest when a local thief and womanizer is killed with a pitchfork.
episodes.title: Judgement Day

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy, with an actor tagging along for research, investigate a slashed painting at a museum, which turns out to be the site of a murder.
episodes.title: Beyond the Grave

episodes.synopsis: When an aristocratic family's decision to turn a memorial garden into a tea shop has the villagers up in arms, murders past and present are uncovered.
episodes.title: Garden of Death

episodes.synopsis: After the severed hand of an heir to a scenic rural hotel and pub is found in the woods, the other heirs receive death threats from an unknown source.
episodes.title: Destroying Angel

episodes.synopsis: A skeptical Barnaby investigates when the body of a criminal is found in a crop circle and the locals blame extraterrestrial activity for the death.
episodes.title: The Electric Vendetta

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy travel to Newton Magna, where their search for a horse whisperer struck by a car is complicated by a body found in the town well.
episodes.title: Who Killed Cock Robin?

episodes.synopsis: The near decapitation of the local postman -- the village lothario -- leads to a series of grisly murders involving other promiscuous villagers.
episodes.title: Dark Autumn

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a local beauty is discovered by her manor house's pool, Barnaby uncovers a seedy world of deceit within the affluent rural community.
episodes.title: Tainted Fruit

episodes.synopsis: In the village of Midsomer Wellow, someone is killing off the bell ringers of the parish church in the week before a big bell-ringing competition.
episodes.title: Ring Out Your Dead

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates the murder of a boy during a traditional annual race at an exclusive private school but meets with resentment.
episodes.title: Murder on St. Malley's Day

episodes.synopsis: An investigation of a car fire and a grisly murder lead Barnaby and Troy to the members of a reading club, which has an agenda that goes beyond books.
episodes.title: Market for Murder

episodes.synopsis: Some of the residents of Midsomer Worthy are trying to prevent James Harrington from turning Setwale Woods into a housing estate.
episodes.title: A Worm in the Bud

episodes.synopsis: Something is fishy about the clubbing deaths of two local residents.
episodes.title: A Talent for Life

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into an elaborate suicide leads Barnaby to suspect the dead man may have had help pulling the trigger.
episodes.title: Death and Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby's wife finds a corpse on the village green while taking part in a painting class, but the elderly lady's identity turns out to be a mystery.
episodes.title: Painted in Blood

episodes.synopsis: When heirs of an aristocratic family are killed, one by explosion and another by electrocution, Barnaby's inquiry uncovers long-hidden family secrets.
episodes.title: A Tale of Two Hamlets

episodes.synopsis: The police investigate the apparent suicide of Julian Shepherd who drowned after driving his car into a nearby river.
episodes.title: Birds of Prey

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Troy tackle two separate cases as Troy prepares to leave Midsomer after his promotion to DI.
episodes.title: The Green Man

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby's new Sergeant arrives on the day after the murder of a local shrew occurs, and he is immediately put to work.
episodes.title: Bad Tidings

episodes.synopsis: Suppressed family secrets, stolen ancient artifacts and a 30-year-old death at a Celtic burial site result in several murders in present-day Midsomer.
episodes.title: The Fisher King

episodes.synopsis: When Midsomer hosts its 12th Annual Literary Festival, an ex-SAS man, who is a friend of Barnaby's daughter, is suspected of offing the competition.
episodes.title: Sins of Commission

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Scott investigate two shotgun murders of staff members of a Midsomer Worthy pub and uncover ill will between locals and newcomers.
episodes.title: The Maid in Splendour

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Scott sniff out the killer when a secretive curate is burned alive inside a straw effigy and accusations of witchcraft begin to fly.
episodes.title: The Straw Woman

episodes.synopsis: Exactly nine years after Ferdy Villers killed himself, his entire family reunites for Christmas unaware that someone is out for revenge.
episodes.title: Ghosts of Christmas Past

episodes.synopsis: Undertaker Patrick Pennyman is found dead with his wrists slashed and suspicion turns towards a spiritualist church.
episodes.title: Things That Go Bump in the Night

episodes.synopsis: The body of the rowing club chairman is found during a race, and when his adulterous past is revealed, jealousy seems to be the motive for his death.
episodes.title: Dead in the Water

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Scott follow a trail of dead people involved in the collecting of rare orchids.
episodes.title: Orchis Fatalis

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby is on the case when an alcoholic horse trainer is killed after threatening to reveal why four people unexpectedly inherited a thoroughbred.
episodes.title: Bantling Boy

episodes.synopsis: DCI Barnaby and Sgt. Scott investigate the death of John Ransom in the village of Midsomer Mere.
episodes.title: Second Sight

episodes.synopsis: Troubled solicitor Nick Turner falls from the roof of his home, is this suicide disguised as murder?
episodes.title: Hidden Depths

episodes.synopsis: When a corporate giant tries to acquire a small but respected relish factory owned by a dysfunctional family, a naked body is found in the warehouse.
episodes.title: Sauce for the Goose

episodes.synopsis: Deaths follow the discovery of a valuable musical manuscript sold cheaply at an auction.
episodes.title: Midsomer Rhapsody

episodes.synopsis: A secluded old house, believed haunted by the residents of Midsomer Newton, becomes a crime scene when a house-hunting couple is found garroted.
episodes.title: The House in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Jones investigate a series of murders linked to the death of a beauty queen which occurred several years previously.
episodes.title: Dead Letters

episodes.synopsis: After Sir Freddy Butler dies, apparently from natural causes, suspicions arise when his will is stolen and an arson attack kills his solicitor.
episodes.title: Vixen's Run

episodes.synopsis: Expert blackmailer Martin Barret is murdered and there is no shortage of suspects.
episodes.title: Down Among the Dead Men

episodes.synopsis: During an excursion with his wife, daughter and mother-in-law, Barnaby gets drawn into the murder of a woman whose brandy flask was spiked with drugs.
episodes.title: Four Funerals and a Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Controversy about a proposed supermarket, marital infidelity, contaminated soil and kinky sex combine to create a baffling case for Barnaby.
episodes.title: Country Matters

episodes.synopsis: A heated competition among Midsomer church choirs is interrupted by the bludgeon murder of the Midsomer Worthy's tenor, a local artist.
episodes.title: Death in Chorus

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby begins to think the damning evidence he helped provide to convict a murderess wasn't exactly as watertight as it first looked.
episodes.title: Last Year's Model

episodes.synopsis: DCI Tom Barnaby and DS Ben Jones investigate the death of Simon Bright, who is found dead inside an old World War II vintage Humber.
episodes.title: Dance with the Dead

episodes.synopsis: When Faith Alexander arrives in Midsomer Deverell to meet her long-lost uncle, she's surprised to find that he has disappeared.
episodes.title: The Animal Within

episodes.synopsis: King's Crystal, a glassware factory in Midsomer Magna, faces ruin following the death of its co-owner, Alan King.
episodes.title: King's Crystal

episodes.synopsis: Badger's Drift plays host to the Midsomer Rock Festival -- with murderous consequences.
episodes.title: The Axeman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby and Jones are called to investigate a series of murders involving a pair of feuding families.
episodes.title: Death and Dust

episodes.synopsis: Someone puts Barnaby in the frame in the murders of two rival photographers.
episodes.title: A Picture of Innocence

episodes.synopsis: A film about the French Revolution is made in Midsomer. People lose their heads in the guillotine, and it's not a film trick.
episodes.title: They Seek Him Here

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby investigates the murder of a former friend and colleague in Midsomer Holm, a small village inhabited by reformed ex-cons.
episodes.title: Death in a Chocolate Box

episodes.synopsis: A 90-year-long feud between two families, the Hicks and the Hammonds, appears to have escalated to murder.
episodes.title: Shot at Dawn

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby has to deal with a murder at the wedding reception for a local aristocratic family as well as daughter Cully's upcoming nuptials.
episodes.title: Blood Wedding

episodes.synopsis: Jones is brought back to his hometown to help investigate a series of murders linked to childhood friends and events that occurred years earlier.
episodes.title: Left for Dead

episodes.synopsis: When a man who's been missing for two weeks is found dead in the woods, Barnaby finds connections between him and a magazine editor.
episodes.title: Midsomer Life

episodes.synopsis: The traditions of a local cult in Midsomer, the Temple of Thoth, appear to be related to a series of murders using the poison of a poison dart frog.
episodes.title: The Magician's Nephew

episodes.synopsis: Over the holidays, Barnaby has to solve an explosion as well as a number of murders near a freight company while trying to cope with his acting chief.
episodes.title: Days of Misrule

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby finds connections between a supposedly haunted forest, the traceless disappearances of two couples and a gang of antiquity thieves.
episodes.title: Talking to the Dead

episodes.synopsis: At the Midsomer Golf club a member is killed with a golf club. During the investigation they find the club full of gambling, violence and extortion.
episodes.title: The Dogleg Murders

episodes.synopsis: The sale of a previously unknown artwork by an 18th-century painter sends Barnaby into an investigation of murders as well as art forgery.
episodes.title: The Black Book

episodes.synopsis: Murders near a government safe house in Midsomer appear to be connected to a group of British spies stationed in East Berlin during the Cold War.
episodes.title: Secrets and Spies

episodes.synopsis: Midsomer's cycling club is amused by the Bucketman, who throws red paint over road hogs -- all employees of the Soft Earth computer company.
episodes.title: The Glitch

episodes.synopsis: In the village of Little Worthy, Bob Moss goes to open up his beloved model village to find a gruesome extra attraction.
episodes.title: Small Mercies

episodes.synopsis: A burglar also becomes a murder suspect after his thefts are intertwined with two homicides. But were the crimes really committed by the same person?
episodes.title: The Creeper

episodes.synopsis: A nervous teacher annoys neighbors with her constant cries that there is an intruder in her house -- until the night a man is murdered in her garden.
episodes.title: The Great and the Good

episodes.synopsis: When a women is stabbed two years after the death of her abusive husband, Barnaby and Jones investigate and uncover her village's dark secrets.
episodes.title: The Made to Measure Murders

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby is suspicious of a mayor's plan to buy up coastal land for profit. But before he can figure out the deal, a property developer is beheaded.
episodes.title: The Sword of Guillaume

episodes.synopsis: During a Wild West show at the local fair, the woman in the dunk tank falls into the water and does not get back up -- turning the water red.
episodes.title: Blood on the Saddle

episodes.synopsis: One night, Joyce swerves her car, narrowly missing a shadowy figure in the road. Later a body is discovered nearby. Did Joyce hit someone after all?
episodes.title: The Silent Land

episodes.synopsis: A student sees a woman jump from a bridge and disappear underwater. When Barnaby and Jones investigate, they find unsavoury connections to the past.
episodes.title: Masterclass

episodes.synopsis: When Midsomer Morchard's own John Kinsella wins a world boxing title in New York, the success stirs up betrayal, infidelity and blackmail.
episodes.title: The Noble Art

episodes.synopsis: A series of inventively savage murders faces Barnaby and Jones as tensions rise over the development of an area of land in the village of Great Pelfe.
episodes.title: Not in My Back Yard

episodes.synopsis: Barnaby reluctantly accompanies Joyce on a spa weekend. But as he attempts to de-stress, a woman is found dead in a flotation chamber.
episodes.title: Fit for Murder

episodes.synopsis: When a local DJ is crushed to death at a girls' boarding school, Barnaby soon discovers that his first Midsomer case may also be his last.
episodes.title: Death in the Slow Lane

episodes.synopsis: A homicide places a reclusive elderly couple under police scrutiny, requiring Barnaby and Jones to untangle generations of family secrets.
episodes.title: Dark Secrets

episodes.synopsis: A string of wedding-themed murders occur in Great Worthy. The case takes Barnaby and Jones to a donkey sanctuary, a pub and a former brothel madam.
episodes.title: Echoes of the Dead

episodes.synopsis: Jones goes undercover after a cult member suddenly disappears. But soon he and Barnaby must start digging into an old case involving a boat explosion.
episodes.title: The Oblong Murders

episodes.synopsis: Fingers point at local druids when a farmer is found murdered at a sacred stone circle. But Barnaby suspects greed is the real motive for the murder.
episodes.title: The Sleeper Under the Hill

episodes.synopsis: When a missing man turns up dead in a vat of cider, Barnaby and Jones hunt for a "giant" killer within a village steeped in bizarre local traditions.
episodes.title: The Night of the Stag

episodes.synopsis: The cloistered world of Midsomer Priory is forced to open its doors to 21st-century policing when a nun is found strangled to death.
episodes.title: A Sacred Trust

episodes.synopsis: A fight between keen birdwatchers in Midsomer-in-the-Marsh turns nasty when their president is killed while hoping to sight a rare bird.
episodes.title: A Rare Bird

episodes.synopsis: The appearance of a headless horseman at Quitewell Hall foreshadows a number of deaths among an aristocratic family involved in an age-old feud.
episodes.title: The Dark Rider

episodes.synopsis: When a barrister is killed in Midsomer, suspicion falls on convicted murderer Grady Felton, whom Barnaby suspects is working with an accomplice.
episodes.title: Murder of Innocence

episodes.synopsis: When an astronomer is killed by a blow with a meteorite, Barnaby and Jones discover intrigue, sexual tension and rivalry among the stargazers.
episodes.title: Written in the Stars

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a film historian is the first in a series of killings that echo the plots of movies starring a 1960s horror actress.
episodes.title: Death and the Divas

episodes.synopsis: As a serial killer strikes members of a chess club, a girl awakens from a coma to discover her boyfriend has mysteriously disappeared.
episodes.title: The Sicilian Defence

episodes.synopsis: As rumors and secrets swirl about a local prep school, Barnaby investigates a series of murders surrounding a famous dairy.
episodes.title: Schooled in Murder
